mapper.insert: insert into pieChatRomm (chat_room, chat_sender, chat_reciever, chat_messages, createDate, expireDate) values(chat_room.nextval, '효효', 'test1', '안녕하세요', sysdate, TO_DATE('20240310', 'YYYYMMDD'))
insert into pieChatMsg (chat_roomNum, chat_sender, chat_reciever, chat_message, chat_receiveTime) values(1, 'test1', '효효', '네 저도 안녕하세요', sysdate)
